channel.title: Dupe
channel.description:
Hello, I was wondering if anyone could help me fix this glitch..
Ex: If you put up two of the same items in a trade, then remove and right click and add, or something it will dupe the item...
I'm not too sure how it works, but I know it has something to do with that..
Thankyou, JC.

item.title: Dupe
